cgcloud__Order_Payment__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Payment__c
cgcloud__Order_Payment__c.description: Holds the attributes of the Order Payment object.

cgcloud__Absolute_Amount__c.description: Amount of the payment without the sign.

cgcloud__Amount_DC__c.description: Amount in domestic currency. Payments are gross values.

cgcloud__CSC__c.description: Card security code of the credit card.

cgcloud__Calc_Amount__c.description: Calculated value of the payment. Used in cash check-in process.

cgcloud__Date_Eff__c.description: Effective date of the means of payment.

cgcloud__Exp__c.description: Expiration date of the means of payment.

cgcloud__Expense_Type__c.description: Indicates whether other types of expenses, such as Road Toll and Gas, are associated.

cgcloud__Initiation_Date__c.description: Date on which the payment is created within the system.

cgcloud__Number__c.description: Number of the means of payment.

cgcloud__Payment_Type__c.description: Payment method to specify in the Payment template.
